nodes.text: The Capital City zoo was a zoological garden located in Capital City, on the planet of Lothal. According to Ezra Bridger, it notably housed cave-dwelling creatures that looked more frightening than the fyrnocks of Fort Anaxes.

The Capital City zoo was first mentioned in Ezra's Duel with Danger, the third title in the Star Wars Rebels chapter books series, which was released on March 17, 2015. The book was written by Michael Kogge.
